name: Iron Shell
desc: Iron Shell operatives must take proactive shield measures to ensure the best defenses against their enemies' common weaponry. Takes %s/%s/%s/%s less damage from beam weapons, scaling on hull size.

name: Zandatsu Subsystems
desc: A highly-experimental and untested combination of Iron Shell's Revengeance defense system and 'Jump' boosters. When activated, the ship system unleashes a concussive blast, reflecting missiles, while the ship itself nimbly lunges in the direction of its current velocity, avoiding ships and weapon fire. Successfully reflecting missiles supercharges the Zandatsu Subystems, boosting their effectiveness.

name: Missile Microforge
desc: A compact prototype missile autoforge, periodically forges missiles for small launchers.

name: Perfect Vengeance Core
desc:
PLACEHOLDER. This Vengeance Core is perfected. Reflects all missiles in a small radius. Successfully reflecting a missile supercharges the ship's vengeance core, improving shield efficiency and engine flow. Failing to reflect any missiles will result in the vengeance core overloading, massively increasing damage received by shields and doubling shield radius as well as disrupting its engine flow.

Does not work with Shield Shunt.

name: Vengeance Core
desc: When activated, the ship system unleashes a powerful concussive blast that reflects nearby missiles. Successfully reflecting a missile supercharges the ship's Vengeance Core, improving shield efficiency. Failing to reflect anything will result in disruption of the core's systems, massively increasing shield damage received and doubling shield arc.

name: Vengeance Relay
desc: Vengeance-class cruisers are capable of synchronizing with subsystems relays in Audacious-class destroyers to temporarily increase combat performance.

name: Indomitable Hull
desc: Due to the sheer amount of heavy armor plating and complicated subsystems within the Indomitable's hull, it cannot support the full complement of missile weapons that its structure technically allows for.

name: Prototype Point-Defense Core
desc: Should not be visible anyway. Have sex.

name: Aegis PD Suite
desc: Should not be visible anyway. Have sex.

name: Peacekeeper Interception Core
desc: Should not be visible anyway. Have sex.

name: Aquila Reactor Protocol
desc: Subsystems are fine-tuned for speed and active venting efficiency. Causes interferences with modifications that affect weapon range, preventing their range boosting capabilities.
short: Drastic improvement in speed, maneuverability, and active venting speed, lower peak time.

name: Avaritia Capacity Overhaul
desc: Overhauls the vessel's flux venting system to be used in rapid short bursts. Due to the system's experimental nature, active venting accumulates huge amount of flux when the capacitors lack sufficient charge.
